results.title: Diggers
results.creator_credit: Frank Thring and Efftee Film Productions
results.brief_description: This was the first feature film of the Melbourne enterprise Efftee Films and was adapted for the screen by Pat Hanna from three sketches from his popular Diggers stage show, which featured two Australian cobbers serving in the AIF in France in 1918. The first episode presents the two friends in their attempts to steal rum from a British Army Store; the second episode shows them relaxing in a French cafe while a fellow digger romances with the waitress; the final episode finds the diggers in hospital feigning illness to escape active duty. Cast includes Pat Hanna and George Moon.
results.description: This was the first feature film of the Melbourne enterprise Efftee Films and was adapted for the screen by Pat Hanna from three sketches from his popular Diggers stage show, which featured two Australian cobbers serving in the AIF in France in 1918. Cast includes Pat Hanna and George Moon.

results.title: When darkness falls
results.brief_description: A street gang armed with an assortment of deadly weapons confronts a boy; he is given no other option but to fight in order to save his life. Animated.

results.title: Ungry ug
results.brief_description: Cute claymation about curious Caveman ‘Ug’, who is feeling very ‘ungry. Luckily Ug spots a small dinosaur running past. Sounds like and easy meal, or is it?
